Name: Linda A
Title: Delhi's best attraction
Review: The temple is beautiful, one of the best attractions of Delhi. Please do not visit on a weekend night, its too crowded and the queues for the cloak room and security are too long. Mobiles and cameras are not allowed so if you can do without your mobile leave it at home to avoid the cliak room queue. The fountain light and sound show is popular hence evenings are busier. The metro has a stop walking distance to the temple. Worth a visit.

Name: Charles Schnaider
Title: Wonderful
Review: Wonderful experience with lots of walking and admiring. Complex is just awsome and stunning. Modern, clean and worth going there with your family.

Name: Deva
Title: Memorable evening @Akshardham Temple.Jaipur
Review: Very clean n holy place. You will find urself there. The dedication and worship will be fallen as blessings from God. One of the best holy places in Jaipur.

Name: Amber T
Title: BEAUTIFUL temple
Review: This was am amazing find. Easily my favorite part of the trip to India (even better than Taj Mahal). Be prepared you can't take cameras on the grounds but it was still amazing to see. The craftsmanship and sculptures and the light show are AMAZING!!!!

Name: Pintya
Title: Excellent
Review: The temple is beautifully constructed and well maintained. mobile phones and cameras are allowed inside. The carvings are remarkable. Restaurant and gardens inside the temple are worth visiting.

Name: Vaidehi J
Title: Evening outing
Review: The temple is beautiful with enough space for relaxation in surrounding gardens. The facilities are nice and good arrangements are made for devotees.

Name: juvlemm
Title: Well maintained
Review: The temple has nice architecture and it is maintaiend well. Surrounding gardens offers relaxation to kids and elderly people. Overall must visit for peace of mind and relaxation.

Name: REVIEWS
Title: Amazing temple..
Review: A fusion of different beautiful stone built .the South Indian food in the restaurant inside the temple .I ly the place. Many tourist are come to visit this awesome place.

Name: yugandhar balaraju
Title: Nice Architecture
Review: Not like delhi akshardham, but if you have not seen it in delhi, Should not miss in jaipur. Architecture is wonderful in the temple, ambiance is also great. Also can find the south Indian food in the restaurant inside the temple. Finally if you visit jaipur akshardham is a must.

Name: Sleepy Treakker
Title: Breathtaking Moment
Review: Magnificent temple premises. A fusion of different beautiful stone built. Intricate carvings. I felt so happy went there. its construction is mind blowing. can't explain in words.must go there.

Name: tush736
Title: Temple..
Review: Temple is very nice to see...for all age of people..carving on stone here is done awesomely...Nice place to have. photography..

Name: Prathamesh Sawant
Title: Modern yet peaceful!!
Review: The architecture is simply stunning. The popularity of this place is more due to its architecture than being a temple. Its a beautiful building and as soon as you are inside the gates you feel a sense of peace and calm.

Name: bournemouthbabe87
Title: One of the top 4 buildings in the world !
Review: Yes, it is modern. If you are looking for a 16th century temple, this is NOT it. But what it IS is truly incredible. How they built something on this scale with the beautiful carvings they did, defies belief. The cost of building this today in the West, would be tens of billions of US$ - it could NEVER happen. I had been to the Taj Mahal the week before, and I thought this was even better - not as pretty, but far more incredible. This was the highlight of my 6 week India tour. Entry to the temple itself is free. The sound and light show, (at barely over 1US$), was well worthwhile too, but get your ticket as soon as you get into the temple as it sells out.

Name: Dimple Sharma
Title: Peace of mind.
Review: This place really gives you peace of mind. I suggest all the youngesters to visit this place with friends.

Name: TravelbuggIndia
Title: Akshardham Temple
Review: Akshardham Temple is a very popular temple here. I liked the beautiful ornate design. It has calm vibes too.

Name: rjpriyanka
Title: Beautiful
Review: Akshardham temples are famous for their beautiful constructions, stone carvings and huge premises. Jaipur is no different.

Name: Umang A
Title: Huge..
Review: Akshardham temples are famous for beautiful construction , amazingly crafted idols and huge set ups.

Name: Amolak Rattan K
Title: Experience peace and tranquility
Review: This is an architectural beauty and marvel. Once you are there you enjoy peace and tranquility and you love to be here.Governor Amolak Rattan Kohli

Name: travellerY3298AY
Title: Amazing place
Review: The carving in marble and sandstone is very intricate with chasing in gold as well in the central mandir ( temple) . There are exhibitions showing the life in  ancient India and the development of Swaminarayan religion and its philosophy of helping everybody irrespective  of caste and religion when there is need. There is a very good light and water fountain show in the evening .

Name: Vimlesh Ranjan
Title: Peaceful
Review: Its not big like other Akshardham temple in India but very peaceful and amazing place for everybody. Its not far from center of city. This is must place to visit if you are in Jaipur.

Name: vishphoo2231
Title: holy temple
Review: Akshardham Temple , is temple of jai shree swami narayan bapa, very beautiful temple one must visit here

Name: HMathur
Title: " Beautiful"
Review: Beautiful temple, wonderful architecture ...looks amazing..small restaurent is also there...u can get gujrati food here.

Name: Rayomand P
Title: Worth a visit
Review: The temple is situated in a nice and peaceful area. It is extremely well maintained. Suprisingly mobile phones as well as cameras were allowed however this is not the case in the temple at Noida. It is a very small place and has a nice museum, the entry for which is INR 20 and thankfully there is no dual pricing for foreigners like other places in Jaipur. Nice to visit and spend an hour.

Name: Venetos A
Title: TOP SIGHTSEEING IN DELHI
Review: I didn't include in my sightseeing program the Akshardham temple , but by chance i did visited , and IT WAS MAGNIFICENT !  The art ,the technique ,the set up , the aura of this place was something beyond description, you need to include in your tour in Delhi.

Name: KIDZEE NIRMAN NAGAR
Title: VERY PEACEFUL PLACE
Review: i always love to visit this place in evening when ever i get time .One can spend 1 to 2 hours here in evening .well maintained park and clean temple .

Name: Mukta2016
Title: Akshardam Temple
Review: The Akshardham temple in Jaipur is a modern temple. The temple within its compound has well laid out green spaces and also a restaurant where food can be had at reasonable rates. we found the experience of visiting the temple to be very good.

Name: Shyam B
Title: Beautiful architecture marvel
Review: The temple has marvellous stone carvings which leaves one spell bound. This has small landscape with beautiful garden, intricately & beautifully carved temple. This place is indeed very peaceful.

Name: Odyssey43852174668
Title: Lovely place
Review: It's a nice temple nice view it's a best place to enjoy your holidays overall we all are very very happy with this tour

Name: Vinay S
Title: Miniature version but still very brilliantly designed
Review: This is quite small as compared to the Delhi Akshardham temple, however, this is equally well designed and laid out. Gardens, cafeteria, children's play area all are there. The food at the temple restaurant is affordable and delicious.

Name: gutteridge
Title: OK if you like crowds
Review: Went here for the sound and light show. Literally hundreds of people queueing, the control was with ropes to hold back the crowd and lots of shouting. We missed the 7pm show and the 8opm was in Hindi, so we enjoyed the video which was impressive, but understood little of what was going on. I hated the experience, my husband thought it was great! Make your own mind up!

Name: GlobeTrotting825044
Title: Good temple
Review: Very good experience....really enjoyed here will recommend to other people....Thank you Will come Delhi next time

Name: Tarun K
Title: A new addition to the city
Review: A good architectural and religious center that has come to the city recently. It makes for a good visit given the popularity from two earlier versions and also the religious importance.

Name: Dave C
Title: A modern wonder
Review: Amazing architecture and even more so when you realise its hand carved and not very old. Take a guide with a good level of English with you to explain the displays under the temple.

Name: aliflaila
Title: Best place to visit in Delhi
Review: This is one of the best place in Delhi to visit. It will take nearly more than half day to visit this place. Dont miss fountain show in the evening.

Name: Biswadeep M
Title: Well maintained temple in vaishali nagar
Review: One of the best place to visit if you are around. Well maintained place, very peaceful, with lots of greenery around. Parking is also available.

Name: P P
Title: Hey! Let's create a Indian Temple Theme Park!
Review: Go on a Weekday - this theme park monument is closed on Mondays. Whatever you do, do not go on a Sunday.Akshardham is where "tour groups" go to see something textbook "Indian". In that way the Akshardham does for Indian Temples what Remix/Mashups do for Old Songs... It's like the phrase you say when someone asks you "Say something in Indian" (yes - that happens here in the USA and yes I have instantly judged them - lol!)Imagine if Disney decided to create mini versions of the Great Pyramids... You could eat, buy your souvenirs and never have to go to the real thing... That's what these guys have done with the is modernized reboot of ancient India. It's nice but there's not journey involved just a metro token!This is not ORIGINAL art. It is a cornucopia of Indian architecture  in a theme park-ish setting with light shows, exhibition and food court! So while it is a way to kill boredom in Delhi (why would anyone be bored in Delhi is beyond me) - and even better way for tour groups to get an instant WOW from the tourist... is is not as "rich" at the original.The originals were create in the 16th century in all white marble - they are best examples are found in the Jain temple of Rankhpur (1.5 hrs outside of Udaipur). Go there and be amazed...Anyone can recreate the Great Pyramids or Taj Mahal  and theme park the hell out of it - but they can never replicate the energies that are still there to this day...

Name: Sandy_JSR
Title: Attractive Architecture & Crowded
Review: Visited on a Sunday evening travelling good distance from our hotel at Amer Road with high expectation, but that didn’t fulfil. The temple is comparatively small and situated in a small ground surrounded by residential / commercial buildings. The architecture of temple is attractive and under illumination the temple looks delightful. When we visited, the place was crowded; hawkers were selling pop-corn, ice cream, etc. inside the campus, it was more a fair like atmosphere. To me, it is good to see but not must see in Jaipur for tourists.

Name: karan a
Title: Peace of mind!!
Review: You will get peace of mind here!!Best thing to get inner peace and rest of mind here!This place has something which cools your soul and freshens you!!

Name: Rajesh Bhukar
Title: A place to be at  anytime of the Day
Review: The temple is so beautifully made and very neat and clean. One can virtually feel peace in the surroundings.

Name: Umang A
Title: Akshardham....
Review: This panth has created their own legacy in building huge and beautiful twmaplea across India. Be it Delhi, ahmedabad or Jaipur.... Each one is master piece.

Name: rayw62devon
Title: Include this in a half day site view
Review: Added this tour half day, picking up several sites rather one. It was a good time to go and those people visiting the temple wanted to explain what was there and details of what was being celebrated over the coming days.

Name: 30poojas
Title: Nice temple
Review: This temple is small but it’s beautiful and calm. It has overnight stay facility and really moderate price and  Premvati restaurant on site which offers very tasty food at very cheap prices. Well maintained temple.

Name: akshat c
Title: Must visit it
Review: Although it is not as great as the one in Delhi.But must visit this temple.We loved it and will come again

Name: poorvipatel85
Title: Very nice family friendly temple.
Review: This temple is quite small but it’s very beautiful and the atmosphere is very calm. We stopped here on route to Akshardham Delhi. We stayed overnight here and we had dinner at the Premvati restaurant on site which offers very tasty food at very cheap prices. There is a bookstall and shop on site where you can buy religious books and items. Very clean complex and well maintained. The gardens are very beautiful and a pleasuren to walk through.

Name: Atul S
Title: Best place to visit with family in Delhi
Review: I have visited here with my family, and we had an amazing experience to remember.We liked light & water show here which was the best among all.

Name: alpha08
Title: nice place to visit
Review: not good as compare to delhi but decent place to visit if you are living near this area , as in jaipur distance is too much so for this visit its not worth

Name: Ktishan Kant Lavania
Title: Good Temple to visit
Review: If you are in Jaipur please don't miss to visit Akshardham Temple, Crowded Temple, but worth to visit.

Name: ddevarshi
Title: Far more human friendly than Birla temple
Review: At this temple you will not feel that you are unwanted. There are temples for wich land was procured from Government on throw away prices in name of creating facilities for public but later on tourists were treated as unwanted intruders. At Birla temple, Jaipur one gets mistreated right from parking lots, At Birla Temple, Jaipur one is not allowed to walk on lawns, one is not allowed to sit in garden, etc. The shoe locker facility is available on payment at Birla temple whereas at Akshardham it is free.  Here at Akshardham one can sit or stand almost at any place of your liking- in temple, open area near temple, garden etc. There is no restriction on photography. Here you dont feel that you have come to house of a dictator where you are unwanted. I will stop going to this place when they the management imposes restriction and no longer maintains it as house of God. There are ice cream and juice stalls just facing temple and no one creates any fuss if anyone enjoys a cup of icecream while appreciating beauty of temple.

Name: MarcinDrP
Title: Worthy visit if...
Review: The point is... do you want to get a feeling of the culture? Then you can go with monuments / history or you can go with living culture... visiting temples and trying to understand is the second way... this temple will give you a piece of India today....

Name: jonesharma29
Title: Akshardham temple
Review: Akshardham temple is famous temple of jaipur. beautiful and well managed.nice to sit here and relax some breath.visiting during evening is amazing

Name: Sweta P
Title: Beautiful
Review: All of the Akshardham Temples within India are highly maintained and really beautiful one and this is also beautiful, loved to visit this Temple.

Name: shirzadi7
Title: Amazing
Review: I think it was as beautiful as Tajmahal, it was so crowded but for foreigners , there is a seprate line . So we don't need to wait so long.

Name: Saroj K
Title: Very Good Temple.
Review: This Temple is well located in Vaishalinagar. Archetctial features are to admire for. Peaceful and full of devotion. I oftenly visit this temple whenever need peace for mind.

Name: Vääruàn B
Title: Great temple
Review: one of the best temple dedicated to Lord Swami Narayan and is one of the most popular tourist destination. you have to take 5-6 hour time to visit everything like boat show, movie, water fountain, multiple small type of jhaki.  all are seeing in nominal cost. amazing place

Name: AAA
Title: Must Visit
Review: Akshar dham is a great temple. Well made. It's temple and location is very beautiful. Must definitely visit once.

Name: Deepanjana Ghosh
Title: Beautiful in the evening
Review: A tad smaller in scale and grandeur than the Akshardham Temple, Delhi, this one is also an architectural marvel. I visited in the evening after sun set and the atmosphere there was peaceful and serene even though you could see hundreds of locals and tourists stinging around the temple complex.

Name: melisabatrol
Title: very well maintained
Review: Akshardham Temple is a perfect example of great temples, We enjoyed alot there, Very huge garden. Love to visit again there.

Name: cbk2911
Title: Architectural Marvel - Most beautiful temple in Jaipur
Review: We visited this temple which is one of the most beautiful temple dedicated to Lord Swami Narayan and is one of the most popular tourist destination. One can see carved artifacts, paintings, which reflects rich culture, royal history of Rajasthan.

Name: gireesh s
Title: Akshar dham jaipur
Review: Good place to fall in lap of God where you can feel energetic and peace good place with beautiful idol

Name: Yun L
Title: Truly worth
Review: This is the best place I have visited in India. It has lots of stone carvings and carved buildings depicting ancient deities etc. Their prices are NOT inflated and they sell the same product to locals as they sell to tourists. I have found most tourist places have a much inflated official price for foreign visitors. You should spend at least 5 hours in this place (including watching their movies) to give justice for its creation. The food in their food hall is also amazingly good and cheap.

Name: ctcmanila
Title: Most beautiful hindu temple
Review: Awesome.  Most beautiful and biggest temple compound. A fusion of different beautiful stone built. Intricate carvings. Camera not allowed inside compound. Shoes not allowed inside main Temple.

Name: Snurps D
Title: A very magical place...Magnificent Temple...
Review: So far, the best temple I've visited. Super love it! Beautiful Architecture with brilliant intricate carvings inside. Majestic structure! There was this heavenly feeling while inside the golden temple. I really felt relieved and at peace here. While inside, I was rotating on the floor like a  child while looking up the very  magnanimous carvings above and around me. A must-see temple once you're in New Delhi.

Name: eitancohen1
Title: nice to see
Review: clean and beautiful but mostly for touristthe fountains show was very nicealso the boat tourthe price was high

Name: audelhi
Title: Attraction in Jaipur
Review: It is one of temple of Swaminarayan sect..  Though it is not as big as temple in Delhi.  But it is good attraction.

Name: anjuanjali
Title: great light show
Review: they dont allow camera and mobile inside as delhi akshardham mandir. visit here in evening. it is great pleasure. nice water and light show at 7pm

Name: Kanikaneg
Title: Religiuos
Review: Great place to visit in the evenings..Place woth visitng. It has Parking facility and fast food snacks.No entry ticket.

Name: shanupce137
Title: Amazing place
Review: It is a good Temple to watch in Jaipur. Comparing it with Delhi's Akshardham so it is not that Big but it has great architecture and design.

Name: Arun K
Title: Very Peace and Beautiful Temple
Review: I went many times here and every time i have some special feeling. It has different kind of stone which used here . I will recommend here to every one.

Name: 671rajeshwarm
Title: Beautiful temple, a must visit
Review: If you have already visited akshardham temples in Ahmedabad or Delhi, you would find this one in Jaipur smaller as compared to others but the same reason makes it so much more attractive. There is no advance planning or booking required for a visit, you would find ample parking space without any hassle and the temple architecture will match that of other bigger temples. Best time to visit will be in the early morning at 6am for the arati. I attended the arati at 7.15 am and liked it very much.

Name: Dhanpatraj D
Title: Festival LOOK
Review: Great place to visit in the evenings.Gives a festical loik.Place woth visitng.Parking facility and also for fast food snacks.No entry ticket.Great place

Name: Paridhi7392
Title: mind blowingTemple
Review: Akshardham temple is fantastic temple of Jaipur .this Temple has wonderful architecture. This temple is so beautiful and also peaceful .

Name: vini_phooh
Title: Small compared to Delhi or Ahmadabad.
Review: Need 30 -45 minutes to see the temple. If you have seen Delhi temple then you can avoid it. Workmanship is okay.

Name: Amen E
Title: New Temple
Review: I saw this place in the morning so we didnt wait in queu too much. Be careful you cant bring your phone and bag to the temple. we enjoy more in 4 exibition about Swaminarayan. I recomment to visit if you have enough times.

Name: AzadAjay
Title: Good spiritual place
Review: Good place for spiritual people. Nice place to feel peace/worship and to spend some good time in a nice spiritual atmosphere.

Name: Raj G
Title: Best local place for picnic
Review: Akshardham is a real hidden treasure tourist attraction, which is known for its beautiful architecture, as shown in the photo. You can enjoy with family go at evening

Name: Sandeepkumar Modi
Title: Tourist
Review: One more feature in the hat of swami narayan construction. as all other this is also to be visited when in jaipur. the envioment is full peace , the soul feels relaxed as you just step into the premises. JAI SWAMI NARAYAN

Name: princ512
Title: Interesting place
Review: Akshardham Temple is one of the well-known tourist attractions of Jaipur. The temple is known for its beautiful architecture

Name: Yashwantpandey
Title: Beautiful Temple
Review: Very beautiful Swami Narayan Temple in Jaipur. Attractive Lighting, Green Lawns, Water Fountains, Vegetarian Restaurant, Conveniently located.

Name: Jeff M
Title: Ancient temple
Review: Pretty ancient temple of India. I reckon i have seen a similar one in Delhi and both are enormous and show background of India.

Name: kvnreddy96
Title: Must visit
Review: Clean and peaceful place in a quiet location. It is very small compared to Akshardham Delhi. Closes at 12:00 PM and opens in the evening. check timings before visiting

Name: Harendra S
Title: For peace
Review: Akshardham temple is very good and awesome place to visit in jaipur. This is located at vaishali nagar, chitrakoot. you can go with your family and also with kids.

Name: Anshuace
Title: Beautiful Temple
Review: This Temple is Near Form My House And Always Come In Temple Its Really Nice And Beautiful Place . a Lovely Garden There Every inches of the temple,it's structure and architecture is a piece of work by almighty god himself.

Name: sam7sky
Title: Peaceful Place
Review: Really peaceful and heart touching view and beautiful carvery on the walls and miniatures are eye catching. A must visit place

Name: TCMAP
Title: India meets Disney
Review: We enjoyed our visit to Akshardham but be warned it is not your typical India sightseeing tour. It has large chunks of a Disney feel to it, large screen film show, mini boat trip through indoor rivers & displays (small world style) & a very good light show in the evening.The temple is modern but impressive.Well worth the visit but historic India it is not.

Name: Anshu M
Title: Very Small as compared to all Akshardham temples
Review: If you have visited delhi or gujarat akshardham temple, This is gonna disappoint you. This is small compared to those temples.They have a food court and small lawn as well. One time visit place if you have some free time.

Name: alice g
Title: Magnificient temple ! Don't miss the light water show at 7pm.
Review: Sad that they don't allow camera and phone inside, it's just magnificient ! I would advise you to go around 4pm to be able to do most of the attractions inside. The light show is great but it's better with people being able to translate for you !Some of the stories  sound a bit like brain washing. I would advise to skip the 50 min movie (number 2) for this reason. But vibe is great all in all :)

Name: Paridhi7392
Title: Awesome Temple
Review: Akshardham temple is very attractive place in jaipur.I went there with my family. I felt so happy went there. its construction is mind blowing. can't explain in words.must go there

Name: virat a
Title: A Beautiful place to relax
Review: A well architectured and beautifully maintained garden is a sole of it. A good place to chillout with friends and family. Though it is not so fabulous and giant in terms of infrastructure as compared to Aksher Dhaam of Delhi and Ahmedabad but have the same spiritual value.

Name: Paul J
Title: Worth the visit
Review: New temple in traditional style, quite amazing, no handbags or backpacks allowed inside, leave them at the hotel to avoid long lines at the cloak room, also no cameras or electronics allowed, for about 4 dollars they will take and print your picture with the temple as a background, bring a pair of sock to go inside , no shoes allowed

Name: relaxtripp
Title: Swami Narayan Mandir
Review: Swami Narayan Mandirs will display a great zeal of architecture anywhere in the world. Dont think of Akshardham delhi when u visit this temple. It is only 5% of the show there. But a peaceful, marvelous and splendid architecture you can witness here too. Get blessings from Lord and Guru here.

Name: Pradeep N
Title: Beautiful evening well spent with wife.
Review: wife took me there as she wanted to visit Akshardham Temple. Beautiful architecture as Name of the temple quiet famous around India.

Name: Krupali S
Title: A famous temple
Review: The temple, contain main idol of lord Narayan. This temple  is well-known because of the beautiful architecture that includes magnificent idols, lifelike sculptures and intricate carvings.

Name: hosseinkhaniniloofar
Title: A breathtaking visit
Review: Taking a tour from a modern temple, this spellbinding monument gives you the chance to spend your time between people and being merged into Indian culture

Name: Cruzz H
Title: Nice Temple
Review: Akshardham Temple is good place to see as far other temple are more beautiful rather then jaipur Akshardham temple., If you wanna visit akshardham temple them must go to Delhi

Name: Seema C
Title: Beautiful Temple!
Review: We visiting the Ashardam Temple complex in October. It was absolutely beautiful. There was an exhibition on the life of Swami Narayan which had an English or Hindi option. It is beautifully done. Following that we watched an informative movie and then watched the laser light show which was definitely the highlight of our visit. The boat ride was also fun. Kids had a great time. Highly recommended.

Name: Shubhang M
Title: Peaceful place
Review: this is very beautiful and peaceful neat n clean temple . so many peoples are visited daily, i am also visit regularly . temple is looking very beautiful . big garden and jain food restaurant here. easy to approach .

Name: sarminderkaur82
Title: Clean and nice
Review: this temple is really very huge, clean and nice, very well oranganised, We love the atomosphere here.

Name: pradeep_parhi
Title: Gorgeous Temple - Not to be missed while in Jaipur
Review: I along with my family had visited Akshyardham temple at Jaipur on 12th Nov 2016 during our holiday trip to Rajasthan. This is located at Vaishali Nagar. The temple is gorgeous with modern architecture. This temple has idols of Swaminarayan along with Radha/Krishna, Ram/Sita and lord Shiva/Parvati/Ganesh. The garden in front of the temple is superb and amazing. The ambience is neat & clean and the floor is made up of marble.The exhibition hall was also good. Entry fee for the exhibition hall is Rs. 20/- per person. This hall depicts the life of Swaminarayan through audio and display of the exhibits. It will take around 1-2 hours for visiting the temple and taking photographs. This is a very peaceful place where one can sit for around one hour. This is a must visit place and not to be missed during Jaipur visit.

Name: Vikramaditya C
Title: Superb Architecture, Peaceful
Review: U may find a lot of historical monuments in Jaipur which are famous for their architecture. But, if you wish to see modern day structures with jaw dropping architecture, it is the best place in Jaipur. This temple is dedicated to Swami Narayan Ji and is the only temple of BAPS Swaminarayan Sanstha in Jaipur. The temple is known for its beautiful architecture, adorable idols, wonderful sculptures, and carvings.The temple is made up of sand stone. The carvings on sand stones used in the temple is spectacular. Further, idols of deities in the sanctum sanctorum are so beautiful that you will just keep on adoring them.Also, there is a very beautiful garden and a restaurant in the temple complex. "Prem Rasoi", the restaurant in the temple complex offers very delicious delicacies, specially the "Daal Khichri".In short, this place is one of the must visit places in Jaipur.You may use this link for the exact location of temple - https://www.google.co.in/maps/place/BAPS+Shri+Swaminarayan+Mandir/@26.9021076,75.7060039,13z/data=!4m8!1m2!2m1!1sakshardham+jaipur!3m4!1s0x396db4979bfaaaab:0xf327bf3573201a4e!8m2!3d26.9021076!4d75.7410228

Name: ramaseth2
Title: Amazing temple
Review: This temple is situated in Vaishali nagar, our hotel is also very close this temple, Very well maintained.
